<title level="1" right="Trait">[Mummy](/Traits.aspx?ID=762)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 363 <sup>1.1</sup>

A mummy is an undead creature created from a preserved corpse.
